Producer: Fred Berger, Gia Coppola, Lauren Bratman, Andrew Garfield, Siena Oberman, Jack Heller, Alan Terpins, Enrico Saraiva, Francisco Rebelo de Andrade, Zac Adams
Production Co: Paint Night Productions, Automatik Entertainment, American Zoetrope, Assemble Media, TUGAWOOD Pictures, Artemis Film, Dynasty Pictures (II)
Synopsis: In MAINSTREAM, a young woman (Maya Hawke) thinks she's found a path to internet stardom when she starts making YouTube videos with a charismatic stranger (Andrew Garfield) -- until the dark side of viral celebrity threatens to ruin them both.
Title: Mainstream
